content.en: We achieved the highest score in the SMARTMEM Memory Failure Prediction Competition at WWW 2025. Congrats to Chenglin, Shouxin and [Xinbin](/xin-bin-hu).
content.zh: 我们在SMARTMEM错误预测比赛（与WWW'2025联合举办）中取得最高分。祝贺汪成林、王守鑫和[胡心彬](/xin-bin-hu)。

content.en: One Paper has been accepted to PPoPP'25. Congrats to [Fulin](/fu-lin-nan).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 PPoPP'25 接收。祝贺 [南福麟](/fu-lin-nan)。

content.en: One Paper has been accepted to HPCA'25. Congrats to [Yuhui](/yu-hui-cai) and Shiyao.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 HPCA'25 接收。祝贺 [蔡煜晖](/yu-hui) 和 林诗尧。

content.en: One Paper has been accepted to ACM TACO. Congrats to [Jiahui](/jia-hui-yang).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ACM TACO 接收。祝贺 [杨佳晖](/jia-hui-yang)。

content.en: One tutorial has been accepted to HPCA'25.
One paper has been accepted to ACM TOS. Congrats to [Yuhui](/yu-hui-cai).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ACM TOS 接收。祝贺 [蔡煜晖](/yu-hui)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ACM TACO. Congrats to [Feng](/feng-zhang).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ACM TACO 接收。祝贺 [张峰](/feng-zhang)。

content.en: Two papers have been accepted to USENIX ATC'24. Congrats to [Ronglong](/rong-long-wu), [Shuyue](/shu-yue-zhou), and [Yijie](/yi-jie-zhong).
content.zh: 两篇论文被 USENIX ATC'24 接收。祝贺 [吴镕龙](/rong-long-wu-zh)、[周书悦](/shu-yue-zhou-zh) 和 [钟一捷](/yi-jie-zhong-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to IEEE TC. Congrats to [Ronglong](/rong-long-wu).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 IEEE TC 接收。祝贺 [吴镕龙](/rong-long-wu-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to HPCA'24. Congrats to [Ronglong](/rong-long-wu).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 HPCA'24 接收。祝贺 [吴镕龙](/rong-long-wu-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to IEEE TC. Congrats to Guowen.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 IEEE TC 接收。祝贺 龚国文。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ICDE'23. Congrats to [Yijie](/yi-jie-zhong).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ICDE'23 接收。祝贺 [钟一捷](/yi-jie-zhong-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ICCD'22. Congrats to Hongbin.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ICCD'22 接收。祝贺 龚红彬。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ICCD'21. Congrats to Hongbin.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ICCD'21 接收。祝贺 龚红彬。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ATC'21. Congrats to Shiyao.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ATC'21 接收。祝贺 林诗尧。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to INFOCOM'21. Congrats to Guowen.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 INFOCOM'21 接收。祝贺 龚国文。
